entry.title: Bio Booster Facial Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: W3ll People
Type: Facial Serum
Price: 29.00

Repair, rejuvenate, calm, hydrate, and protect your complexion with this incredibly powerful all-in-one active botanical serum! A seven-in-one everything formula powered by organic botanicals. Turmeric & Seabuckthorn strengthen the skin, organic Rose Hip & Pomegranate repair + rejuvenate, while Algae Complex & Rose Hip brighten + correct uneven skin tone.

• Primes + perfects skin surface with Broccoli Seed

• Soothes sensitive skin & calms Rosacea with Calendula + Carrot Seed

• Combats breakouts with organic Red Raspberry + Black Cumin

• Natural Ingredients

• Made in the USA with love

• Not tested on animals OR robots

• .34 oz / 10 ml

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles and bad mojo

Ingredients

Rosa Moschata (Rose hip) seed oil*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Fruit Oil*, Rubus Idaeus (Red Raspberry) Seed Oil*, Jojoba Oil/Macadamia Seed Oil Esters (and) Squalene (and) Phytosteryl Macadamiate (and) Phytosterols, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Brassica Oleracea Italica (Broccoli) Seed Oil, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract*, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil*, Calendula Officinalis Flower Oil*, Melaleuca Leucadendron Cajaputi (Cajaput) Oil*, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Oil*, Nigella sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract*, Amyris Balsamifera (Amyris) Oil, Pelargonium Roseum Leaf (Rose Geranium) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Neroli) Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Petitgrain) Leaf Oil, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil, Aniba Rosaeodora (Rosewood) Wood Oil, Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Oil, Canaga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil, Myroxylon Pereira (Balsam Peru) Resin. *Organic

Directions

Apply to freshly cleansed face morning and night. Add a drop or two to Bio Tint Multi-action Moisturizer for boosted skin treatment and flawless application. For a radiant finish and extra long wear, set with Bio Brightener Invisible Powder.

entry.title: 06 Body Perfecting Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr Jackson's
Type: Body Lotion
Price: 84.00

This exhilarating gel is rich in antioxidants to moisturize, revitalize + retexturize the skin. Containing sea buckthorn, kigelia, baobab, orange flower (neroli) and patchouli, the 06 Body Perfecting Gel is a light yet decadent formula that visibly tightens + firms skin all over the body, giving it a silky, lustrous feel. Ideal for use post-gym or yoga, the restorative aroma of patchouli acts as a soft base scent for your perfume or cologne.

• Suitable for all skin types

• All Natural Ingredients

• Paraben free, Sulfate free

• 6.76 oz / 200 ml

Ingredients

Aqua, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil, Kigelia Africana Fruit Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Pogostemon Cablin (Patchouli) Oil, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Alcohol Denat., Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Limonene+, Linalool+ (+ naturally occurs in essential oils)

Directions

Use all over after showering.

entry.title: Minimalist Illuminating Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gressa Skin
Type: Highlighter
Price: 45.00

Accentuates and highlights with a pearlized glow. Achieves sheer, natural-looking highlights with a luminous, shimmering finish.

GRESSA Healing ComplexTM is a proprietary powerhouse blend of carefully selected botanical extracts that care for your skin by providing it with overall balance, radiance and clarity. Minerals provide an illuminating effect and natural finish.

• .5 oz / 15 ml

Ingredients

*Brassica oleracea (Broccoli) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, GRESSA Healing ComplexTM *Silymarin, *Neem (Azadirachta indica) Extract,*Horsetail (Equisetum arvense) Extract, *Lemon Balm (Melissa officianalis) Extract, *Barberry (Berberis vulgaris) Extract, *Sea Buckthorn (Hippophae rhamnoides) Seed Extract, *Elder Flower (Sambucus nigra) Extract, *Bitter Melon (Momordica charantia) Extract, Licorice Root (Glycyrrhiza glabra) Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate Non-GMO, Coenzyme Q10, Ascorbyl tetraisopalmitate, (Vitamin C), *lecithin, *glycerin, mica, iron oxides, titanium oxide. *CERTIFIED ORGANIC

Directions

Shake well to ensure a perfect mix. Drop 1-2 drops in the palm of your hand. Rapidly spread the Illuminating Serum and gently pat onto desired areas. Use it to highlight and contour brow bones, cheeks, and Cupid's bow for a look that's refreshed and radiant. Use the Immaculate Buffing Brush to flawlessly buff and blend the serum out for a radiant glow.

entry.title: Minimalist Contouring Serum Bronzer

Vendor: Gressa Skin
Type: Bronzer
Price: 45.00

Sheer tinted infusion of antioxidant-rich extracts perfectly contours your face. Applies weightlessly on the skin and naturally warms all skin tones with stunning radiance + a bronzed glow.

GRESSA Healing ComplexTM is a proprietary powerhouse blend of carefully selected botanical extracts that care for your skin by providing it with overall balance, radiance and clarity. Minerals provide a sun-kissed glow natural finish.

Ingredients

*Brassica oleracea (Broccoli) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, GRESSA Healing ComplexTM *Silymarin, *Neem (Azadirachta indica) Extract,*Horsetail (Equisetum arvense) Extract, *Lemon Balm (Melissa officianalis) Extract, *Barberry (Berberis vulgaris) Extract, *Sea Buckthorn (Hippophae rhamnoides) Seed Extract, *Elder Flower (Sambucus nigra) Extract, *Bitter Melon (Momordica charantia) Extract, Licorice Root (Glycyrrhiza glabra) Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate Non-GMO, Coenzyme Q10, Ascorbyl tetraisopalmitate, (Vitamin C), *lecithin, *glycerin, mica, iron oxides, titanium oxide. *CERTIFIED ORGANIC

Directions

Shake well to ensure a perfect mix. Drop 1-2 drops in the palm of your hand. Rapidly spread the Contouring Serum and gently pat onto upper forehead, cheeks, chin, and nose—where the sun naturally kisses the skin. entry.title: Lip Boost
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gressa Skin
Type: Lip Sheer
Price: 29.00

Glam your pout with Gressa Lip Boost. Light, non-sticky and moisturizing, it feels like a balm yet looks like a gloss.

Aux Rouge - “The red”. Classic statement of strength, sensuality your own feminine signature.

Bare - Sheer, nude, and sexy, Your lips but better.

Brilliant - Minimalistic, light with specks of sophisticated shimmer.

Lavish - Sheer, sexy, and sultry. Luxurious, velvety, plum.

Radiant - Bright, glowing and lustrous. Modern, timeless, seductive and playful.

Regal - Suitable for a queen. A deep dark plum, warm and voluptuous.

• .24 oz / 7 ml

Ingredients

*Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, *Butyrospermum (Shea) parkii Butter, Magnifera Indica (Mango) Butter, *Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, *Seabuckthorn Seed Oil, Ubiquinone (CoEnzyme Q10),*Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E) Non-GMO, Mica, Iron Oxides. *CERTIFIED ORGANIC

Directions

Wear alone or over any lip color of your preference.

entry.title: Happy Gum Drops + Oil Swishing Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Living Libations
Type: Oral Hygiene Products
Price: 30.00

A natural mouthwash alternative, every ingredient is selected to balance, protect, refresh, and invigorate the mouth.

Swishing with oil is an ancient Ayurvedic practice used throughout ancient India and Egypt. This deep dental clean involves swishing botanical oil in the mouth for 10 minutes. The oil draws impurities to itself, detoxifying the mouth and restoring balance to the entire oral environment. When the oil is released, toxins, and unwanted bacteria go with it!

Swishing with CoQ10 gets it deep between the teeth and into gum pockets, increasing concentration where it is needed most, suppressing inflammation and encouraging happy, pink gums. Medium chain triglycerides, or MCT oil, is an ultra-concentrated coconut oil. By infusing your oral ecology with nourishing MCT the detoxification process deepens, and the mouth achieves optimal balance.

• 1.69 oz / 50 ml

Ingredients

Coconut MCT Oil, Seabuckthorn Berry, Rose Otto (Rosa damascene), Peppermint (Mentha piperita), Thyme Linalool (Thymus officinalis linalool), Tea Tree Oil (Malaleuca alternifolia), Cinnamon (Cinnamomum verum), Clove Bud (Eugenia carophyllata), Co-enzyme Q10 (CoQ10), Oregano (Origanum vulgare).

Directions

Since time immemorial, oil swishing has been used to achieve healthy teeth and gums without a toothbrush or toothpaste! Simply swish a squirt of these action-ready drops for 10 minutes for a deep clean and extra purifying oral care regimen. This swishing serum is brimming with botanical-biotics ready to bolster the home of your mouth’s microbiome.

Formulated WITHOUT Parabens, Sulfates, Artificial Fragrances, Silicones, Synthetic Dyes, Artificial Colors, Petrochemicals, & Animal Testing

Sucrose (Natural Cane Sugar)* Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter* Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil* Euphorbia Antisyphilitica (Candelilla) Wax, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil* Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Butter* Ricinus communis (Castor) Seed Oil* Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Powder, Essential Oils of Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium)*, Mentha Spicata (Spearmint)*, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint)* *Certified Organic/Wildcrafted

Directions

Gently massage a pea-sized amount onto damp lips; rinse

entry.title: Best Skin Ever: Chocolate Body Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Living Libations
Type: Body Oil
Price: 58.00

Living Libation's Best Skin Ever: Chocolate Oil is a sensual, silky body oil, rich in lipids that sink into the skin. Use for massage, or after bathing to melt away stress and soothe dry skin. This beautiful body oil is perfect for the skin after swimming and sunning.

• 100 ml / 3.38 fl oz

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Seabuckthorn Oil, Fresh Vanilla and Cacao Beans infused in Virgin Coconut Oil, Golden Jojoba Oil, Rose Otto, Lemon, Ylang Ylang Essential Oils.

Directions

Directions for using Best Skin Ever to Wash the Face: Wet a small portion of a washcloth with water. Squeeze it out. Apply one to two squirts of Best Skin Ever to the dampened portion of the washcloth. Gently massage the face and/or body with the moistened cloth. Wash gently or vigorously, depending on if you would like an exfoliating effect. Rinse cloth. Rinsing face/body is optional. Moisturize skin following cleansing.

Directions for Using Best Skin Ever on the body after a Bath or Shower: With skin still damp after a bath/shower, wet a washcloth with water. Squeeze it out. Apply a few squirts onto the wet washcloth. Massage the entire body - head to toe - with the cloth. Use a more vigorous approach for more exfoliation or for problem areas.

entry.title: Everybody Loves The Sunshine Body Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Living Libations
Type: Sunscreen
Price: 30.00

Living Libations' Everybody Loves The Sunshine is an organic formula, rich in essential oils, that harmonizes your time in the sun. It promotes healthy Vitamin D absorption from the sun while limiting the free radical damage associated with the sun's rays. While it is not an SPF, the potent herbal and plant ingredients prohibit burns and other damage to your skin. It can even prolong the life of your tan.

• 50 ml / 1.7 fl oz

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Desert Jojoba Plant, Virgin Coco-Creme, Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Seabuckthorn Berry Oil, Tamanu Berry, Essential Oils Of Schizandra Berry, Immortelle, Carrot Seed, Rose Otto, Cape-Chamomile, Frankincense, Sandalwood, Ginger, Lavender, Turmeric, Calendula and Palmarosa.

Directions

Apply every 30 minutes when outside in the sun. For extended periods in the sun, a hat, shade and/or cotton clothing may be necessary

entry.title: Seabuckthorn Shampoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Living Libations
Type: Shampoo
Price: 25.00 - 40.00 (2 variants)

Living Libations’ Seabuckthorn Shampoo brings out the best in all hair types without the chemical suds! Ingredients

Pure Spring Water, Herbal Infusions Of Calendula, Red Clover, Oats, Coltsfoot, Horsetail, Comfrey, Nettles, Chamomile, And Bladderwrack Seaweed In Golden Jojoba Oil; Yucca And Coco-Protein; Orange Wax; Extracts Of Seabuckthorn Berry, Sage, And Rosemary; And Essential Oils Of Grapefruit, Peppermint, Vetiver, And Lime.

Directions

Massage a small amount into wet hair. Add water as necessary to create lather. Rinse. Apply hair conditioner. May be diluted further to use as a body wash and a bubble bath.
